title: Professional development aligned with personal values
description: Professional development aligned with personal values
content:
Scenario: Professional development aligned with personal values
    Given Aisha is building her career
    And she wants work aligned with her values
    When Aisha makes professional development decisions
    Then the personal_agent should help her assess value alignment
    And it should highlight opportunities matching her principles
    And it should flag when work conflicts with core values
    And professional growth should support personal integrity
    And the system should help her build career consistent with values
    And work should serve her flourishing, not just employment
